author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. official urges China to allow direct work with Wuhan labs on coronavirus
description: A senior Trump administration official urged China on Tuesday to allow the United States to work directly with laboratories in Wuhan on research into the novel coronavirus, saying this was critical to saving lives globally.
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A senior Trump administration official urged China on Tuesday to allow the United States to work directly with laboratories in Wuhan on research into the novel coronavirus, saying this was critical to saving lives globally.
